lessons.title: Continents
lessons.content: There are 7 continents: Africa, Antarctica, Asia, Europe, North America, South America, Australia.

lessons.title: Countries and Capitals
lessons.content: Each country has a capital city. For example, the capital of France is Paris.

quiz.question: What is the capital of Japan?

lessons.title: Maps and Directions
lessons.content: Maps show locations and help us find directions.

quiz.question: What does a compass rose show?

lessons.title: Landforms
lessons.content: Mountains, rivers, and deserts are different landforms on Earth.

quiz.question: Which is a type of landform?

lessons.title: Weather and Climate
lessons.content: Weather is daily conditions like rain or sun. Climate is the average weather over time.

lessons.title: Natural Resources
lessons.content: Natural resources are materials we get from the Earth, like water, minerals, and forests.

lessons.title: Cultural Geography
lessons.content: Cultural geography studies how people live, their traditions, and how they use land.

quiz.question: What does cultural geography focus on?

lessons.title: Environmental Awareness
lessons.content: Understanding how to protect our environment and natural resources.

quiz.question: Why is it important to protect the environment?
options: To keep it clean for future generations
quiz.answer: To keep it clean for future generations

lessons.title: Global Issues
lessons.content: Learning about global issues like climate change, poverty, and migration.

quiz.question: What is a major global issue?
